components/home/grid:
{{#if item_type}}

{{title}}

{{#each (limit item_type limit)}} {{> components/product-catalog/product-item catalog_view='grid' image_ratio=../theme_settings.product_grid_image_ratio default_image=../theme_settings.default_image not_lazy=true quick_shop=../theme_settings.quick_shop hide_brand=../theme_settings.product_brand_hidden hide_price=../theme_settings.restrict_to_login price_range_display=../theme_settings.price_range_display retail_price_label=../theme_settings.retail-price-label non_sale_price_label=../theme_settings.non-sale-price-label sale_price_label=../theme_settings.sale-price-label price_label=../theme_settings.price-label }} {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/common/image:
{{!-- Helper to display any image with alt text. @param img The image object @param size The preset size to use. @param url Optional: Set the url this image should link to. @param default Default image to display @param image_ratio The image class to apply to the wrapping element. @param image_size The image class to apply to the wrapping element. @param not_lazy Optional: do not lazy load (mainly used for ajax-loaded images) --}} {{#if not_lazy}} {{#if url}} {{else}}
{{/if}} {{else}} {{#if url}}
{{else}}
{{/if}} {{/if}}
components/common/compare-checkbox:
<input
  type="checkbox"
  class="input-checkbox sr-only"
  name="products[]"
  value="{{id}}"
  id="compare-{{id}}"
  data-compare-checkbox
  data-compare-id="{{id}}"
  data-compare-title="{{name}}"
  data-compare-url="{{url}}"
  data-compare-price="{{price.without_tax.formatted}}"
  data-compare-thumbnail="{{getImage image 'thumb' (cdn default_image)}}">
